title: Use mobile data whilst connected to a particular WiFi network
content:
Hi
I would like my Pixel 4 XL (Android 10) to only use mobile data, whilst staying fully connected to a particular WiFi network.
I connect my phone to my car's WiFi connection, but this connection does not have internet.
I would like to use my 4G whilst connected to this WiFi. This used to be possible I believe, and is possible on a Samsung device.
Could someone point me in the direction of how to do it please, assuming I can on a Pixel device running 10?
Thanks
